headline: Applied Materials Targets 2nm AI Chips As Valuation Stretches And Orders Matter
summary: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) announced new chipmaking systems for advanced deposition, etch, and materials modification at 2nm and beyond. The systems are designed to support Gate All Around transistor architectures for next generation logic chips. The company positions these tools to enable more energy efficient AI chips as chipmakers prepare for 2nm class production. Applied Materials, a major supplier of semiconductor manufacturing equipment, is putting fresh focus on tools that...
